titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur HL.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/22/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on Desmodur HL (aromatic polyisocyanate based on toluene diisocyanate (TDI) and hexamethylene diisocyanate (HDI) dissolved in n-butyl acetate).
